text: The Czech Extraliga is the name of the professional handball league of Czech Republic. == Competition Format == The season begins with a regular season between the twelve teams. The first eight teams qualifies for the play-offs, while the last four plays a relegation round. == Naming and sponsorship == The name of the league is leased to a general sponsor and changes frequently. * 1993 - 1995: 1.liga * 1995 - 2007: Extraliga * 2007 - 2011: Zubr extraliga * 2011 - 2014: Tipgames extraliga * 2014 - 2015: Triglav pojišťovna extraliga * 2015 - current: Extraliga == 2019/20 Season participants== The following 12 clubs compete in the Extraliga during the 2019-20 season. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Team !City !Arena |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |SHC Maloměřice Brno |Brno |Sportovní hala Maloměřice |- bgcolor=ffffe0 |SSK Talent M.A.T.
